message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120. I think it's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll love it!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking of making an offer of $110. I think that's a fair price considering the product is worth $100 to you.

I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I was thinking of making a counteroffer of $125. I'm willing to meet you halfway and give you a better deal than my initial offer. Let's see if we can come to an agreement!

I appreciate your counteroffer, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $125. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $115. I think that's a fair price considering the product is worth $100 to you.

I understand your concerns, Bob, and I'm willing to make another counteroffer. I'm willing to go up to $128, but that's as high as I can go. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you. Let's see if we can come to an agreement!

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $122. I think that's a fair price considering the product is worth $100 to you.

I understand that you're still hesitant, Bob, but I'm willing to make one more counteroffer. I'm willing to go up to $130, but that's as high as I can go. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you. Let's see if we can come to an agreement!
